pkgmetadata.longdescription: # juneberryjuneberry â€” Advanced Logging in Python# InstallationYou can install `yakui` with Python Installer of Python (`pip`)```bashpip install juneberry```# Examples`examples/basic.py````pyfrom juneberry import Loggerlogger = Logger(name="basic")logger.info("Hello, world!")logger.warn("Hello, world!")logger.debug("Hello, world!")logger.error("Hello, world!")logger.fatal("Hello, world!")```
